item.title: Guidance for data custodians and data collectors
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: This page contains information and resources produced by the Language Data Commons of Australia project. Our Other Resources page has relevant resources created and hosted elsewhere. Guidance for data governance decisions (pdf)
